title: Jacks School of Shines
description: Headmaster Barns lay in the schoolyard, dead, killed by the Black Robes. Colin, one of the chosen 5 student wizards from the School of Shines, must stand between the Evil Goblin and the world of good, fighting ghouls and creatures of the Dark and Evil. The Evil Goblin holds for ransom Colin’s best friend, Eibhlin. Can Colin’s magic save her? Can he avenge the Headmaster's death?
author: Jack Sorenson
